articles.content: Mukesh Ambani-owned Reliance Industries Ltd (RIL) on Friday reported a 5% decline in its consolidated net profit to Rs 15,138 crore for the first quarter ended June 2024. The same stood at Rs 16,011 … [+6872 chars]

articles.title: No office, no leaves! HCLTech links employee leaves to office attendance - CNBCTV18
articles.description: Employees have to be in office three days a week and at least 12 days in a month, else their leaves will be cut for each day they are absent, people familiar with the matter said.
articles.content: Before HCLTech, TCS was in the eye of the storm after the company decided to link its quarterly variable pay component to the employees attendance in office in April. On having less than 60%attendanc… [+1522 chars]

articles.description: Infosys Share Price: This came after Infosys trumped street estimates in its financial performance for the first quarter of financial year 2024-25 (Q1FY25) while also giving higher growth guidance than expected for FY25
articles.content: Jefferies, too raised its target price at Rs 2,040 from 1,630 with a Buy rating on Infosys.  Further, JP Morgan also remained Overweight on the IT major with a raised target price at Rs 1,950.  At 09… [+184 chars]
